document_data.name: ''Dead Shot''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Dead Shot''''' was a unique ''[[longbow of marksmanship]]'' owned by one of the dukes of [[Delthuntle]] in [[Aglarond]].
document_data.Powers: It possessed a ''+2 [[Item enchantment|enchantment]]'' and significantly increased the damage caused by [[arrow]]s loosed from its string.
document_data.History:
For many years, [[Raymond|Duke Raymond]] of Delthuntle and [[Edwall Dest|Duke Edwall Dest]] of [[Spandeliyon]] had a fierce rivalry with one another. After agreeing to partake in an archery contest with his rival, Duke Edwall orchestrated the theft of ''Dead Shot'' from Duke Raymond.

On the day of the contest, Edwall shot the bow at the head of a [[humanoid]] target, that in fact had been enchanted at Duke Raymond's behest. Just as the head of the target was torn asunder by the bow's [[arrow]], so too did the head of Duke Edwall.

By the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, ''Dead Shot'' came into the possession of a [[hobgoblin]] [[Hakt]] under the employ of the bandit-leader [[Tazok]].
